Title: Creed
Overview: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.
Tagline: Your legacy is more than a name
Keywords: underdog, sport, spin off, underground fighting, motivational speaker, boxing
production_companies: New Line Cinema, Warner Bros., Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM), Chartoff Winkler Productions
Cast: Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Graham McTavish
